/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/:
The image captures a moment on a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from the back of a green and white bus, giving a driver's eye view of the scene. The bus is in motion, driving on the right side of the road, adhering to the local traffic rules.

The street is lined with lush green trees, their leaves rustling in the unseen wind, providing a natural canopy over the urban setting. The sky above is a clear blue, devoid of any clouds, suggesting a bright and sunny day.

In the distance, the sun is shining brightly, casting a warm glow over the scene. The sun's rays create a lens flare effect in the image, adding a touch of artistic flair to the otherwise ordinary day.

Despite the busyness of the scene, there's a sense of order and harmony. The buildings, cars, and trees all coexist, each playing their part in the rhythm of city life. It's a snapshot of a moment, frozen in time, yet full of life and movement.
